p: The survival of B. bifidum in probiotic yogurts containing the extracts and essential oils of the F. angulata plant was significantly higher than the control treatment ( p < .05). On the first, 7th, and 21st days, the highest survival of B. bifidum was measured in probiotic yogurts containing 0.03% of FAEO and on the 14th day in probiotic yogurts containing 0.4% of FAEE. In general, in all treatments, the survival time of the bacterium B. bifidum decreased, and the lowest life expectancy was measured on the 21st day and the highest life expectancy on the first day (Table 8).
